title: Alarm for Cobra 11 - Nitro
description:
1. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS
 ======================

"Alarm for Cobra 11 - Nitro" uses Microsoft DirectX 9.0c.

System Specifications
* Windows XP with Service Pack 2
* DirectX 9.0c
* Athlon XP or Pentium IV 1.8 GHz or better
* 256 MB RAM
* 3D video card with at least 128 MB, at least Shadermodel 2.0, HW T&L supported
* DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
* 1.3 GB free hard drive space
* 2x DVD ROM


Supported video cards: AGP 4x / 8x or PCI Express

* ATI Radeon 9600 or better
* nVidia GeForce 6600 or better
Not compatible with integrated video solutions, laptops in particular.
